content:
The chunk creates the tip of an arrowhead in a 3D scene by adding vertices, normals, colors, and constructing a triangle strip primitive for the arrow's tip, then attaching this geometry to the node.

boxVertexWriter.addData3f(0.0, sY * 2.0, 0.0)
    boxNormalWriter.addData3f(0, 0, 1)
    boxColorWriter.addData4f(color[0], color[1], color[2], color[3])

    boxTris.addVertex(4)
    boxTris.addVertex(5)
    boxTris.addVertex(6)
    boxTris.closePrimitive()

    boxGeom = Geom(boxVertexData)
    boxGeom.addPrimitive(boxTris)

    attachNode.addGeom(boxGeom)
    return boxGeom
